posters.title: Curtis Stone Soup Maker 全新，可以做豆浆
posters.label: 新品出售信息
description: Enjoy comforting soups, healthy smoothies and tasty jams when you use this soup maker from Curtis Stone.
• Six pre-set cooking modes: pulse, puree, chunky, smoothie, jam, saute, keep warm
• Select your desired cooking mode through the easy-touch control panel
• Four-layer Dura-Pan non-stick coated jug for easy cleaning (four times the strength of unreinforced non-stick surfaces)
• Lift and look function: pause mid-program to open the soup maker and check on your food or drink; replace the lid to resume program
